edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.globalworkspace
Interface Coalition

All Known Implementing Classes:
CoalitionImpl, MockCoalition
public interface Coalition

Input Data to GW. It is generated by Attention Codeletes. Coalitions must overwrite correctly equals() and hashcode() methods * @author Javier Snaider

decay

void decay()
this method decay the activation of the coalition. It should be called after each broadcast by the GlobalWorkspace
